sentences.english: With the chance of Universiade, Shenzhen proposes to build a voluntary city with the effort of all citizens.

sentences.english: It is impossible to construct a resource-saving society without the formation of national notion of saving.
sentences.chinese: 建设资源节约型社会与全民节约观念的形成密不可分。

sentences.english: Sports activities for the general public were extensively developed, and the level of competitivesportscontinued to improve.

sentences.english: Kazhuo people of Mongolian nationality in Yunnan Province are all bilingual people.

sentences.english: Body-building of all the people is the inexorable trend of the social development and the common requirement of the nation.

sentences.english: by not really aggressively educating all of its population about the internet.

sentences.english: Mass participation is a prominent feature in the ceremony of spraying for rain.

sentences.english: Cultural consciousnesses among all Chinese people determine the practice of Chinese Traditional Learning.

sentences.english: It seems that the "Farming" age has passed away.

sentences.english: We will launch extensive fitness programs for the general public and raise the level of competitive sports.

sentences.english: The FullBellyProject also has a pedal -powered sheller.

sentences.chinese: 第十二条国家设立全民国防教育日。

sentences.english: The construction of urban and rural public sports and exercise facilities was accelerated, and the national fitness program has taken root.
